main.name: Prakash Dayaramani
main.description: I love to work on various Software Applications.
main.bio: I have worked on various roles like Full Stack Architect/ Full Stack Developer/ Backend Developer and so on. I am expert in designing and working on Java/Node based systems. I have worked on domains like Payments, Banking, Insurance, Manufacturing, Supply Chain etc. I enjoy reading and playing chess in my free time
main.contactmessage: I am happy to hear from you regarding any opportunities or feedback you have. Please fill form below to get in touch with me

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
